locale.name: en_US
locale.message: Save your changes to view the new cover image.
Details about the available publication format: {$format}

The layout editor uploads the production-ready files that have been prepared for publication here. Use +Assign to designate authors and others to proofread the page proofs, with corrected files uploaded for approval prior to publication.
Enter your own file size value?
Include the metadata for this publication format in the catalog entry for this book.
The publication format you have chosen no longer exists for this monograph.
A publication format must be chosen.
Add this format to the catalog entry.
Remove this format from the catalog entry.
Make this format available to readers. Downloadable files and any other distributions will appear in the book's catalog entry.
This format will unavailable to readers. Any downloadable files or other distributions will no longer appear in the book's catalog entry.
A file size for digital formats required.
A product availability code is required.
A product composition code must be chosen.
Check this box to use this Sales Rights entry as a catch-all for your format. Countries and regions need not be chosen in this case.
There is already a ROW sales type defined for this publication format.
A date is required and the date value must match the chosen date format.
You may assign an agent to represent you in this defined territory. It is not required.
You may leave the following section empty if you provide your own services to your customers.
Please choose a location for this spotlight.
Approve the proof for indexing and inclusion in the catalog
Page proofs file is ready for publication
View this item in the catalog
Feature this in the catalog carousel
Mark this submission as a 'new release'
Toggle the availability of this format on and off
This series will appear on the main navigation
The series URL will be {$sampleUrl}. The 'Path' is a string of characters used to uniquely identify a series.
The category path must consist of only letters and numbers.
The category path already exists. Please enter a unique path.
Are you sure you wish to remove this category?
Online and print ISSN must not be the same.

Welcome to Catalog Management. From this page you can publish new catalog entries; review and configure your Featured Books listing; review and configure your New Releases listing; and review and configure your books by Category and Series.

To list a book in the catalog, select the Monograph tab and fill in the necessary information. Information for each of the book’s formats can be included in the catalog entry by selecting the tab for the format. The metadata specifications are based on ONIX for Books which is an international standard used by the book industry for communication of product information.
Three spotlights (e.g., Featured Book) appear on the press homepage, with spotlight title, image, and text.

The cover image of selected books appears toward the top of the homepage as a scrollable set. Click 'Feature', then the star to add a book to the carousel; click the exclamation point to feature as a new release; drag and drop to order.
Click 'Feature', then the star to select a featured book for this category; drag and drop to order.
Click 'Feature', then the star to select a featured book for this series; drag and drop to order. Series are identified with an editor(s) and a series title, within a category or independently.
No titles have been published yet.
No new releases are available at this time.
No titles were found which matched your search for "{$searchQuery}".
No titles have been published yet for this section.
One title was found which matched your search for "{$searchQuery}".
{$number} titles were found which matched your search for "{$searchQuery}".

Please note: In order to purchase items, you will need to log in first. Selecting an item to purchase will direct you to the login page. Any item marked with an Open Access icon may be downloaded free of charge, without logging in.
Choose how to order the books of this series.
Choose how to order the books of this category.
Choose how to order the books in the catalog.
Please fill out the form completely.
Please select a valid option from the list.
You cannot add the same item twice.
The catalog information need not be completed on initial submission of the work, apart from Title and Summary.
If book title begins “A'” or “The” (or something similar re alphabetical order) place word in Prefix.
Include users with no roles in this press.
Submit an Monograph: Author registration is currently disabled.
Register as a Reviewer: Reviewer registration is currently disabled.
Fill in this form to register with this press.
Select a press to register with:
There are no presses you may register with on this site.
Click here if you are already registered with this or another press on this site.
Click here if you are not already registered with this or another press on this site.
Enter your existing username and password to register with this press.
This press is currently not accepting user registrations.
The password you entered is not long enough.
Notified by email on publication of a monograph.
Able to submit items to the press.
Willing to conduct peer review of submissions to the press.
Willing to conduct peer review of submissions to the site.
Identify reviewing interests (substantive areas and research methods):
You must select at least one role
You must be registered and logged in to submit items and track current submissions. {$login} to an existing account or {$register} a new account.

As part of the submission process, authors are required to check off their submission's compliance with all of the following items, and submissions may be returned to authors that do not adhere to these guidelines.

This press uses Open Monograph Press {$ompVersion}, which is open source press management and publishing software developed, supported, and freely distributed by the Public Knowledge Project under the GNU General Public License.

This site uses Open Monograph Press {$ompVersion}, which is open source press management and publishing software developed, supported, and freely distributed by the Public Knowledge Project under the GNU General Public License.
Open a new page to edit this information

Thank you for downloading the Public Knowledge Project's Open Monograph Press {$version}. Before proceeding, please read the README file included with this software. For more information about the Public Knowledge Project and its software projects, please visit the PKP web site. If you have bug reports or technical support inquiries about Open Monograph Press, see the support forum or visit PKP's online bug reporting system. Although the support forum is the preferred method of contact, you can also email the team at pkp.contact@gmail.com.

Upgrade

If you are upgrading an existing installation of OMP 0.x, click here to proceed.

1. The following files and directories (and their contents) must be made writable:

  • config.inc.php is writable (optional): {$writable_config}
  • public/ is writable: {$writable_public}
  • cache/ is writable: {$writable_cache}
  • cache/t_cache/ is writable: {$writable_templates_cache}
  • cache/t_compile/ is writable: {$writable_templates_compile}
  • cache/_db is writable: {$writable_db_cache}

2. A directory to store uploaded files must be created and made writable (see "File Settings" below).

OMP Version {$version}

Thank you for downloading the Public Knowledge Project's Open Monograph Press. Before proceeding, please read the README and UPGRADE files included with this software. For more information about the Public Knowledge Project and its software projects, please visit the PKP web site. If you have bug reports or technical support inquiries about Open Monograph Press, see the support forum or visit PKP's online bug reporting system. Although the support forum is the preferred method of contact, you can also email the team at pkp.contact@gmail.com.

It is strongly recommended that you back up your database, files directory, and OMP installation directory before proceeding.

If you are running in PHP Safe Mode, please ensure that the max_execution_time directive in your php.ini configuration file is set to a high limit. If this or any other time limit (e.g. Apache's "Timeout" directive) is reached and the upgrade process is interrupted, manual intervention will be required.

For complete Unicode (UTF-8) support, select UTF-8 for all character set settings. Note that this support currently requires a MySQL >= 4.1.1 or PostgreSQL >= 9.1.5 database server. Please also note that full Unicode support requires the mbstring library (enabled by default in most recent PHP installations). You may experience problems using extended character sets if your server does not meet these requirements.

Your server currently supports mbstring: {$supportsMBString}
Your server currently allows file uploads: {$allowFileUploads}
Your server currently allows a maximum file upload size of: {$maxFileUploadSize}
The primary language to use for this system. Please consult the OMP documentation if you are interested in support for languages not listed here.

Select any additional languages to support in this system. These languages will be available for use by presses hosted on the site. Additional languages can also be installed at any time from the site administration interface. Locales marked * may be incomplete.

Enter full pathname to an existing directory where uploaded files are to be kept. This directory should not be directly web-accessible. Please ensure that this directory exists and is writable prior to installation. Windows path names should use forward slashes, e.g. "C:/mypress/files".

OMP requires access to a SQL database to store its data. See the system requirements above for a list of supported databases. In the fields below, provide the settings to be used to connect to the database.

IMPORTANT!

The installer could not automatically overwrite the configuration file. Before attempting to use the system, please open config.inc.php in a suitable text editor and replace its contents with the contents of the text field below.

Installation of OMP has completed successfully.

To begin using the system, login with the username and password entered on the previous page.

If you wish to receive news and updates, please register at http://pkp.sfu.ca/omp/register. If you have questions or comments, please visit the support forum.

Upgrade of OMP to version {$version} has completed successfully.

Don't forget to set the "installed" setting in your config.inc.php configuration file back to On.

If you haven't already registered and wish to receive news and updates, please register at http://pkp.sfu.ca/omp/register. If you have questions or comments, please visit the support forum.
The round {$round} review by {$reviewerName} for submission {$submissionId} has been cleared.
The due date for the round {$round} review of submission {$submissionId} by {$reviewerName} has been set to {$dueDate}.
{$reviewerName} has declined the round {$round} review for submission {$submissionId}.
{$reviewerName} has accepted the round {$round} review for submission {$submissionId}.
{$editorName} has marked the round {$round} review for submission {$submissionId} as unconsidered.
An editor decision ({$decision}) for monograph {$submissionId} was recorded by {$editorName}.
The submission {$submissionId} has been restored to the queue.
{$editorName} has been assigned as editor to submission {$submissionId}.
Enter your email address to be notified when new content is added to the press.

This page includes updates associated with this press, such as new monographs or series. You may subscribe to these notifications through RSS feeds (by clicking on the images to the right), or through email.
A new monograph, "{$title}," has been submitted.
A reader has made a comment on "{$title}".
A new monograph has been submitted to which an editor needs to be assigned.
You have been asked to review copyedits for "{$file}".
You have been asked to review layouts for "{$title}".
You have been asked to create an index for "{$title}".
This submission is currently awaiting approval in the Catalog Entry tool before it will appear in the public catalog.
The metadata for the catalog entry must be approved before the publication format is included in the catalog. To approve catalog metadata, click on Monograph tab above.
A configured payment method is required before you can define e-commerce settings.
The monograph has been approved. Please visit Catalog to manage its catalog details, using the catalog link just above.
You have been denied access because you do not seem to be a valid reviewer for this monograph.
You have been denied access because you do not seem to be the author of this monograph.
You have been denied access because you do not seem to be an assigned reviewer of this monograph.
You have been denied access to the specified monograph file.
Invalid monograph or no monograph requested!
You are trying to access a monograph that is not part of your series.
Access denied! You have not been assigned to this workflow stage.
Access denied! The user group you are currently acting under has not been assigned to this workflow stage. Please check your press settings.

File formats can be made available for downloading from the press website through open access at no cost to readers or direct sales (using an online payment processor, as configured in Distribution). For this file indicate the basis of access.
A valid numeric price is required.
This transaction is for the purchase of a direct download of a single monograph or monograph chapter.
Reloaded XML help mapping file {$filename} in search of {$id}.
Published File Plugins add support for displaying different document types inline, e.g. using PDF embedding.
